study_plan_entry.title: Engineering internship (master in Life Sciences and Technology)

en.title: Engineering internship (master in Life Sciences and Technology)

free_text.Remarque: Cette description ne concerne pas l'année 2010-2011 mais les étudiants qui rentreront en cycle de Master en année académique 2011-2012.
free_text.Prérequis: Bachelor in Life Sciences and Technology
free_text.Contenu: Full time (usually during the summer break before Ma1 or Ma3) professional activity within a relevant company, asking for the specific competence of a future engineer in Life Sciences & Technologies or Bioengineering.  The internship has to be approved by the EPFL.
free_text.Objectifs d'apprentissage: [li]Internships in a company become an integral part of EPFL students' program. This is an excellent opportunity for our students to get a crucial insight into the day-to-day workflow in industry and also offer to the company their broad expertise and skills in the Life Sciences and in Engineering. It should thus reach the following objectives: [br/][br/][li]Immersion in a productive professional environment;[br/][li]Familiarization to the company's processes and workflow;[br/][li]Sensitization to team work;[br/][li]Acquisition of the requirements of the skills asked to an engineer.

fr.title: Stage d'ingénieur (master en Sciences et technologie du vivant)
